blur_detection.description: The receipt shows clear, well-defined text with sharp edges and good focus throughout.
blur_detection.recommendation: No action needed as text is clearly legible for OCR processing.

contrast_assessment.description: The receipt exhibits excellent black text on white paper contrast that enhances readability.
contrast_assessment.recommendation: No improvements needed as contrast is sufficient for accurate data extraction.

glare_identification.description: Minor glare/shadow appears at the top left corner from the glass object but does not affect any text content.
glare_identification.recommendation: No action needed as glare does not interfere with receipt information.

water_stains.description: No water stains, discoloration, or water damage visible on the receipt.
water_stains.recommendation: No action needed as the receipt is free from water damage.

tears_or_folds.description: The receipt appears flat with no visible tears, creases, or folds affecting text readability.
tears_or_folds.recommendation: No action needed as the receipt physical condition is excellent.

cut_off_detection.description: The receipt is fully captured within the frame with all edges and content visible.
cut_off_detection.recommendation: No action needed as all receipt content is properly framed.

missing_sections.description: The receipt appears complete with header, line items, tax information, total, and footer text all present.
missing_sections.recommendation: No action needed as the receipt contains all expected sections.

obstructions.description: A glass ashtray/dish partially overlaps the upper left corner but does not obscure any receipt text.
obstructions.recommendation: No action needed as the obstruction does not affect any receipt information.
